# test program
#start to define instructions
INSTR:51
10100100110001100101      #LDX X3,101
00000100010001100101      #LDR R0,X1,101
00000111010001100110      #LDR R3,X1,102
11110101000000000000      #IN R1,0
11111001000000000001      #OUT R1,1
00001001110001101001      #STR R1,X3,105
00011111000000000001      #SIR R3,1
00011000000000000001      #AIR R0,1
00001000000001100101      #STR R0,X0,101
00001011000001100110      #STR R3,X0,102
01000111000000110011      #JGE R3,X0,51
11011100000000000000      #EOP 
#start to define data portion
DATA:100
00000000000001101001      #DATA 105,100
00000000000000000000      #DATA 0,101
00000000000000000011      #DATA 3,102
